name: Treat Fighter: Triple Treat
description:
WASD - To Move

E - To Punch

R - To Kick

SPACE - Turbo

x 3 = triple crown = rampage mode (1 hit kill)

+ x 3 = triple treat for a big score bonus!

A Halloween themed beat'em up! Punks everywhere are stealing candy from trick or treaters and it's up to you to stop them! Use traditional punch kick combos by combining the E and R keys. Collect crowns to enter rampage mode and clear the field quickly.

Take back the candy and return it to their horse-dressed victims to earn points. Combo three returns in a row and earn the fabled Triple Treat bonus!

Original link: http://saltw-jam1.herokuapp.com/
